summary: Core Valentine page and success view appear to be implemented, including the exact success text “Good choice” and an pointing to the required generated asset path. However, the required static image asset file itself is not present in the diff. The diff also adds backend and Internet Identity-related code despite being out of scope / non-goals, and it appears to touch paths declared immutable in the BuildRequest constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated image(s) as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them directly from the frontend (do not proxy through the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The Valentine success view references "/assets/generated/couple-cats.dim_1024x1024.png", but the diff does not add the actual image file under frontend/public/assets/generated (no frontend/public/... files are listed as added).

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend canister entry file even though no backend functionality is required.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states no backend functionality is required; diff adds a backend actor file.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity provider wiring and actor hook added, despite Internet Identity authentication being a non-goal and not required for the Valentine page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include Internet Identity authentication, but the diff adds InternetIdentityProvider usage and actor/identity hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes/additions in paths listed as immutable by the BuildRequest constraints.
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints say not to edit specific immutable paths, but the diff includes additions for those exact paths (suggesting they were created/overwritten).
